name: The SpaceBar Quest
description:
This is a very short game, about 5 minutes lifespan if you don't lose. It's a 2D space sidescroller where you just have to get to the end of the level without losing all of your HP (2HP per character, 5 characters). But beware of the effects of alcohol on the drivers !

There are only 3 levels but that was hard enough to make ! 

___

Arrow Keys to move, the rest will be explained.

All of the assets (sound, script, graphics) have been made by ME during the jam period (Interstellar 3 game jam)!

Exceptions:

- Some of the sound effects come from Pixabay and SFXR : 

https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/search/spaceship/ ; Sound Effect from Pixabay;Sound Effect from Pixabay

https://sfxr.me/

- The music for the intro and ending were made by me before the jam started, but the other music were made specifically for this game.

- I made the camera shake scrpit using this :

https://medium.com/nerd-for-tech/tip-of-the-day-simple-2d-camera-shake-in-unity-...

- The background space screen for the sidescrolling parts was made by https://tools.wwwtyro.net/space-3d/index.html
